H0.text: Length is the measurement of something along its greatest dimension.

H1.text: Stretch is the measurement of something along its greatest dimension.

H2.text: Height is the measurement of something along its greatest dimension.

A3.text: Length is commonly understood to mean the most extended dimension of a fixed object.

A4.text: In a triangle, the length of an altitude, a line segment drawn from a vertex perpendicular to the side not passing through the vertex (referred to as a base of the triangle), is called the height of the triangle.
